law.catch_line: Limitations on use of reverse auction process.
law.text: The reverse auction process shall not be used to procure architectural, engineering, or engineering-related services as described in KRS 45A.730; underwriter, bond counsel, or financial advisors as described in KRS 45A.850; or contracts for construction as described in KRS 45A.030 which are required to be bonded as described in KRS 45A.185 and 45A.190 or those projects which would require the preparation of stamped drawings.
law.history: Created 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 71, effective June 20, 2005.
